description.plain: Ilias Vrettos was born in Athens on 2 September, belongs to Virgo’s zodiac sign and has a Libra Ascendant. He grew up in Palaio Faliro and is very young with music. At the tender age of ten with his requirement his parents wrote him at the National Conservatory to attend classical guitar lessons, music theory and sophistication. At the same time, at the age of seven, the sport comes to life, and Ilias initially deals with swimming and then starred in the pole of Palaio Faliro with which he excelled in many national championships.https://s3.amazonaws.com/filepicker-images-rapgenius/FwUvPjVpSLWng1h2Bzjt_images

description.plain: Kai Petao Psila is song of Ilias Vrettos. Music by Konstantinos Pantzis, lyrics by Vasilis Dimas. The song that gives its name to the album.

album.full_title: Kai Petao Psila by Ilias Vrettos
album.name: Kai Petao Psila

annotatable.link_title: Kai Petao Psila by Ilias Vrettos
annotatable.title: Kai Petao Psila

body.plain: Kai Petao Psila is song of Ilias Vrettos. Music by Konstantinos Pantzis, lyrics by Vasilis Dimas. The song that gives its name to the album.

songs.lyrics:
Kai Petao Psila Lyrics[Verse 1]
Ora se koitazo na 'sai ekei mesa sto rythmo mes' ti mousiki
Kai na vro aformi ena tropo gia na sou miliso
Eipa na keraso dyo pota mipos erthoume ligo pio konta
Kai pou xereis isos pio meta ta glyka sou cheili na filiso

[Pre-Chorus]
Pio omorfi den echo dei xana pote kai pouthena
Sto leo alithina, agapisa gia proti mou fora
Ti nychta afti o erotas mou edose 'ftera

[Chorus]
Kai petao psila mechri t' asteria 'ftano ki akoma parapano
Apopse echo petaxei kai planiti echo allaxei
Se allo kosmo pao, s' alli trochia pernao
Mes' ta matia se koitao kai sta synnefa petao
[Break]
Do you want to start the game again

[Verse 2]
Mou gelas kai kano sa paidi echo trelathei den pato sti gi
Eisai mia eikona magiki, ena oneiro pou zo st' alitheia
Xero akougetai ypervoliko omos niotho kati monadiko
Les kai irthes ap' ton ourano san prinkipissa ap' ta paramythia

[Pre-Chorus]
Pio omorfi den echo dei xana pote kai pouthena
Sto leo alithina, agapisa gia proti mou fora
Ti nychta afti o erotas mou edose 'ftera

[Chorus]
Kai petao psila mechri t' asteria 'ftano ki akoma parapano
Apopse echo petaxei kai planiti echo allaxei
Se allo kosmo pao, s' alli trochia pernao
Mes' ta matia se koitao kai sta synnefa petao

[Pre-Chorus]
Pio omorfi den echo dei xana pote kai pouthena
Sto leo alithina, agapisa gia proti mou fora
Ti nychta afti o erotas mou edose 'ftera

[Chorus]
Kai petao psila mechri t' asteria 'ftano ki akoma parapano
Apopse echo petaxei kai planiti echo allaxei
Se allo kosmo pao, s' alli trochia pernao
Mes' ta matia se koitao kai sta synnefa petao
[Outro]
Kai petao psilaEmbed

songs.title: Katastrefomai

description.plain: Ilias Vrettos shares the song “Katastrefomai”, a musical battle with an explosive effect, which gave the title to his new album “Sosto Mou Lathos”.

songs.embed_content: Read “Katastrefomai” by Ilias Vrettos on Genius

album.full_title: Sosto Mou Lathos by Ilias Vrettos
album.name: Sosto Mou Lathos

body.plain: Ilias Vrettos shares the song “Katastrefomai”, a musical battle with an explosive effect, which gave the title to his new album “Sosto Mou Lathos”.

songs.lyrics:
Katastrefomai Lyrics[Verse 1]
Sto fili sou kaigomai
St' angigma sou chano tis aisthiseis
Kai me mia sou matia
Pao na trelatho
O, ti peis to dechomai
Me ankalia sou tha me peiseis
Ki otan leipeis trechontas tha ’rtho na se vro

[Refrain]
Katastrefomai m' afti ti schesi
Katastrefomai alla m' aresei
Oso me kratas erotevmeno
Dipla sou ego tha meno
Katastrefomai m’ afti ti schesi
Katastrefomai alla m' aresei
Eisai esy to pio sosto mou lathos
Pou to thelo kata vathos
[Chorus]
Gia na se kratiso tha polemiso
Osa ki an mou lene tha synechiso
Thyma sou echo ginei kala to xero
Ma s' agapao ki as ypofero
Gia na se kratiso tha polemiso
Osa ki an mou lene tha synechiso
Me kratas demeno ston erota sou
Gia panta tha 'mai edo konta sou

[Break]
(Gia panta tha 'mai edo konta sou)

[Verse 2]
Kathe epithymia sou trecho na tin pragmatopoiiso
Ki otan me chreiazesai vriskomai ekei
Echeis katalavei pos makria sou den boro na ziso
Kai to ekmetallevesai dichos logiki

[Refrain]
Katastrefomai m' afti ti schesi
Katastrefomai alla m' aresei
Oso me kratas erotevmeno
Dipla sou ego tha meno
Katastrefomai m' afti ti schesi
Katastrefomai alla m’ aresei
Eisai esy to pio sosto mou lathos
Pou to thelo kata vathos
[Chorus]
Gia na se kratiso tha polemiso
Osa ki an mou lene tha synechiso
Thyma sou echo ginei kala to xero
Ma s’ agapao ki as ypofero
Gia na se kratiso tha polemiso
Osa ki an mou lene tha synechiso
Me kratas demeno ston erota sou
Gia panta tha 'mai edo konta sou

[Chorus]
Gia na se kratiso tha polemiso
Osa ki an mou lene tha synechiso
Thyma sou echo ginei kala to xero
Ma s’ agapao ki as ypofero
Gia na se kratiso tha polemiso
Osa ki an mou lene tha synechiso
Me kratas demeno ston erota sou
Gia panta tha 'mai edo konta sou

[Outro]
(Gia panta tha 'mai edo konta sou)
(Gia panta tha 'mai edo konta sou)Embed

songs.title: Katalave To
songs.embed_content: Read “Katalave To” by Ilias Vrettos on Genius

album.full_title: Sosto Mou Lathos by Ilias Vrettos
album.name: Sosto Mou Lathos

songs.lyrics:
Katalave To Lyrics[Verse 1]
Katalave to makria sou echo thema
Oli i zoi mou kataligei s' ena psema
Choris esena einai adynato na ziso
Pos na synechiso
Katalave to pia den xero ti na kano
Echo archisei tora meres na ta chano
Einai aximerota kai dyskola ta vradia
Zo mesa sta skotadia

[Bridge]
Den tin palevo allo pia ti monaxia
I apousia sou fotia, pou kaiei mera nychta stin kardia mou
Den tin palevo allo pos na sou to po
To evales fainetai skopo, chilia kommatia na kopo
[Chorus]
Po po po, poso se thelo
Po po po, poso mou leipeis
Po po po, poso ponao
Kai s' anazitao
Oso zo tha to fonazo, pos s' agapo kai den s' allazo
Na' soun edo na ginoume ena, ola ta dino gia sena

[Verse 2]
Katalave to makria sou arrostaino
Ap' ton paradeiso stin kolasi pigaino
Sou leo chanomai kai tipota den kaneis
Thes na me trelaneis
Katalave to einai provlima megalo
Na mi boro ap' to myalo mou na se vgalo
Kai mono esy me dyo lexeis tha to lyseis
Pes pos tha gyriseis

[Bridge]
Den tin palevo allo pia ti monaxia
I apousia sou fotia, pou kaiei mera nychta stin kardia mou
Den tin palevo allo pos na sou to po
To evales fainetai skopo, chilia kommatia na kopo

[Chorus]
Po po po, poso se thelo
Po po po, poso mou leipeis
Po po po, poso ponao
Kai s' anazitao
Oso zo tha to fonazo, pos s' agapo kai den s' allazo
Na' soun edo na ginoume ena, ola ta dino gia sena
[Bridge]
Den tin palevo allo pia ti monaxia
I apousia sou fotia, pou kaiei mera nychta stin kardia mou
Den tin palevo allo pos na sou to po
To evales fainetai skopo, chilia kommatia na kopo

[Chorus]
Po po po, poso se thelo
Po po po, poso mou leipeis
Po po po, poso ponao
Kai s' anazitao
Oso zo tha to fonazo, pos s' agapo kai den s' allazo
Na' soun edo na ginoume ena, ola ta dino gia sena

[Outro]
Po po poEmbed

songs.full_title: Ti Den Katalaveneis by Ilias Vrettos
songs.title: Ti Den Katalaveneis

description.plain: “Ti Den Katalaveneis” is the title of his new song, in music Kostas Miliotakis and lyrics by Dimitris Tsafas. As everything shows “Ti Den Katalaveneis” will be the song that we will dance and sing loud this winter! The new song of Ilias Brettos is released by Universal Music.

songs.embed_content: Read “Ti Den Katalaveneis” by Ilias Vrettos on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Ti Den Katalaveneis by Ilias Vrettos
annotatable.title: Ti Den Katalaveneis

body.plain: “Ti Den Katalaveneis” is the title of his new song, in music Kostas Miliotakis and lyrics by Dimitris Tsafas. As everything shows “Ti Den Katalaveneis” will be the song that we will dance and sing loud this winter! The new song of Ilias Brettos is released by Universal Music.

songs.lyrics:
Ti Den Katalaveneis Lyrics[Verse 1]
Ti zoi mou den boro na fantasto choris esena
Ola einai mataia, ta panta moiazoun na einai psema
Noima den echoune ta oneira mou makria sou
Tha 'kana ta panta gia mia thesi mesa sti kardia sou

[Chorus]
O, ti epsachna to vrika mes' ta dyo sou matia
Me koitas kai amesos spaei i kardia chilia kommatia
Zo gia sena kai yparcho, zita mou o, ti theleis
S' agapao
Pos to lene ti den katalavaineis

[Verse 2]
Chano kathe elencho tis ores pou 'sai makria mou
Aposyntonizomai, xechnao kai to onoma mou
Ti zoi mou omorfi tin kanei to chamogelo sou
Par' to pia apofasi pos eimai ego o anthropos sou
[Chorus]
O, ti epsachna to vrika mes' ta dyo sou matia
Me koitas kai amesos spaei i kardia chilia kommatia
Zo gia sena kai yparcho, zita mou o, ti theleis
S' agapao
Pos to lene ti den katalavaineis
 
[Bridge]
Ti den katalavaineis, ti
Ola gia mena eisai esy
Einai i proti mou fora pou agapo alithina

[Chorus]
O, ti epsachna to vrika mes' ta dyo sou matia
Me koitas kai amesos spaei i kardia chilia kommatia
Zo gia sena kai yparcho, zita mou o, ti theleis
S' agapao
Pos to lene ti den katalavaineis

[Break]
Ti den katalavaineis
Ti den katalavaineis

[Chorus]
O, ti epsachna to vrika mes' ta dyo sou matia
Me koitas kai amesos spaei i kardia chilia kommatia
Zo gia sena kai yparcho, zita mou o, ti theleis
S' agapao
Pos to lene ti den katalavaineis
[Outro]
Ti den katalavaineis1Embed

songs.full_title: Tον άνθρωπο τον λάθος (Ton Anthropo Ton Lathos) by Ilias Vrettos
songs.title: Tον άνθρωπο τον λάθος (Ton Anthropo Ton Lathos)

annotatable.link_title: Tον άνθρωπο τον λάθος (Ton Anthropo Ton Lathos) by Ilias Vrettos
annotatable.title: Tον άνθρωπο τον λάθος (Ton Anthropo Ton Lathos)

songs.lyrics:
Tον άνθρωπο τον λάθος (Ton Anthropo Ton Lathos) LyricsΣτα ξαφνικά
Ήρθες και με έκανες στον έρωτα και πίστεψα
Λίγο από εμένα μες στα μάτια σου αντίκρισα
Κι έκανα χώρο για να μείνεις πάντα εδώ
Σιγά σιγά
Τη σκοτεινή πλευρά σου απο έρωτα συνήθισα
Και τον εαυτό μου για χατίρι σου αδίκισα
Ήταν πολύ καλό για να ναι αληθινό

Τον άνθρωπο το λάθος αυτόν αγάπησα
Τον άνθρωπο το λάθος αγκάλιαζα με πάθος
Τον άνθρωπο το λάθος αυτόν εμπιστεύτηκα
Κι ας ήταν όλα λάθος κι ας ήταν όλα ψεύτικα

Στα ξαφνικά
Εκεί που νόμιζα πως ζούσα σε μια όαση
Μέσα στα μάτια σου αντίκρισα μια κόλαση
Στην επιφάνεια βγήκαν όλες οι πληγές
Σιγά σιγά
Αναρωτήθηκα άμα στ αλήθεια ήθελα
Εγκλωβισμένος να μαι μέσα σε μια θύελλα
Και να κερδίζουνε οι λύπες τις χαρέςEmbed
